snippet: A network of 37 Protestant and Orthodox Christian denominations is preparing a campaign to lobby the president to rescind his executive order on immigration....

headline.main: Fun-Loving South African Golfer Hobday Dies at 76
headline.print_headline: Fun-Loving South African Golfer Hobday Dies at 76

lead_paragraph: A network of 37 Protestant and Orthodox Christian denominations is preparing a campaign to lobby the president to rescind his executive order on immigration.
